data.title: Police arrest two suspects in Tak charity fair bombing
data.description: Investigation ordered into possible police negligence after attack kills three

data.title: South Korean parliament votes to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol
data.description: Vote comes in wake of controversial declaration of martial law in early hours of December 4

data.title: Flash flood catches Chumphon residents off guard
data.description: Video has surfaced of  Chumphon  residents being caught off guard by  flash floods , with many dismayed to see their furniture set afloat.

data.title: Myanmar fishing boat seized in Thai waters
data.description: RANONG: A Myanmar fishing boat has been confiscated and its six crewmen arrested for smuggling in this southern province after 40,000 kilogrammes of salt-fermented shrimp were found on board.

data.title: Chiang Mai hotel presents exhibition ‘Apamaya: Without Illusion’
data.description: Showcase features sculptures by Siripong Ruangsri and avant-garde silver jewellery designs by Sirirat Jivanuwong

data.title: Introducing The Zero Bangtao: Smart Living Meets Smart Investing
data.description: Nestled in the heart of Bangtao, Phuket, The Zero Bangtao is redefining modern living with its perfect blend of sustainability, style, and investment potential. This groundbreaking development is designed for forward-thinkers who value innovation, comfort, and eco-consciousness.

data.title: Ex-Man City striker set to be Georgia's new far-right president
data.description: TBILISI — Georgian ex-footballer turned far-right politician Mikheil Kavelashvili is set to become Tbilisi

data.title: Spectacular venues in Thailand where you can count down to the New Year
data.description: Seven locations across the country, offering excitement through a range of activities

data.title: ‘Moo Deng’ ready to charm and light up Bangkok at New Year event
data.description: Pygmy hippo and her army will help illuminate nine locations in capital

data.title: Govt under pressure over move allowing foreign pilots on domestic routes
data.description: After opposition from pilots’ association, ICAO raises questions on safety

data.title: Thailand's digital economy booms amid surge in foreign investment
data.description: Accounts for nearly a quarter of national GDP

data.title: South Korean president impeached
data.description: SEOUL - South Korea’s opposition-led parliament impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol on Saturday, voting to suspend him from his official duties over his short-lived attempt last week to impose martial law.

data.title: Hua Hin Airport set for international status as passenger numbers up
data.description: Government has allocated funds to upgrade airport’s infrastructure to international standards

data.title: Flood cuts off Asian Highway in Chumphon, gateway to South
data.description: Officials deploy roadblock at Pathomphon Intersection in Muang district

data.title: Saudi tourist rescued after 5 hours at sea off Pattaya
data.description: A Saudi Arabian woman was rescued after five hours at sea following a jet ski accident off the coast of Pattaya.

data.title: Korea to invest 1 billion baht in EV, battery factory in Thailand
data.description: South Korean cosmetic company also planning to set up Thai factory, commerce minister says

data.title: Trump calls for end to daylight saving time
data.description: WASHINGTON - US President-elect Donald Trump says the Republican Party “will use its best efforts” to end daylight saving time, which he called “inconvenient, and very costly to our Nation”.

data.title: Prince Andrew embroiled in Chinese ‘spy’ flap
data.description: LONDON - A Chinese businessman who had forged close links with Prince Andrew and was authorised to act on his behalf to seek investors in China has been banned from Britain on national security grounds.

data.title: B300bn allocated for six double-track railway projects
data.description: The Transport Ministry aims to invest almost 300 billion baht to expand a raft of double railway tracks next year.

data.title: At least 3 killed, scores injured in grenade attack at Tak fair
data.description: At least three people were killed and scores injured when a grenade was thrown into an annual fair in the Umphang district of northern Tak province late on Friday night. Two Karen teenagers were subsequently arrested.

data.title: 4 killed, 48 injured as explosive goes off at Tak’s Red Cross fair
data.description: Hunt on for perpetrator who threw military-grade improvised explosive device

data.title: Thailand’s online channel sets tempo for retail sector’s 7.3% growth
data.description: Retailers advised to study market trends and adjust their businesses accordingly

data.title: Six rare giant catfish surface in Cambodia
data.description: PHNOM PENH — Conservationists in Cambodia on Friday celebrated the discovery of six highly endangered Mekong giant catfish in the critical Southeast Asian waterway plagued by illegal fishing, habitat loss and plastic waste.

data.title: South Korean president faces second impeachment vote
data.description: SEOUL — South Korean lawmakers vote Saturday on whether to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol over his failed martial law bid, in a second parliamentary showdown that remains too close to call.

data.title: Four women arrested in Bangkok for allegedly running illegal surrogacy
data.description: Woman who provided surrogacy candidates arrested in condo
